item.title: Ordered Momentum for Asynchronous SGD
item.description: Ordered Momentum (OrMo) significantly boosts asynchronous stochastic gradient descent (ASGD) convergence by cleverly incorporating momentum, resolving prior convergence issues. This novel approach is…
